patterns: What are different types of scholarship?
responses: IF you SRMJEEE score is below 1000, you will avail a scholarship of 25%, if it's below 500  you will avail a scholarship of 50%
There are several types of scholarship in srm. At the time of the admission we have either sports quota or your score in SRMJEEE.
